keyword.title: Keyword
keyword.description: Keyword to search for in the Pinterest profile/posts. It can be a Location, job title, company name, etc or combined.

pagesToScrape.title: Maximum Emails to Scrape
pagesToScrape.description: The number of emails to scrape. The scraper will stop after scraping this amount of emails.

scrapeGmail.title: Scrape @gmail.com?
scrapeGmail.description: Whether to scrape emails with @gmail.com domain

scrapeYahoo.title: Scrape @yahoo.com?
scrapeYahoo.description: Whether to scrape emails with @yahoo.com domain

scrapeOutlook.title: Scrape @outlook.com?
scrapeOutlook.description: Whether to scrape emails with @outlook.com domain

scrapeCustom.title: Custom email domains to scrape (Without '@' symbol)
scrapeCustom.description: Custom email domains to scrape. Without the '@' symbol

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration. For best results use proxy
